name: DeathYard
description:
DeathYard is single player, true first person short horror game created for "The GameDev.tv GameJom 2022" on theme "Death is only the beginning". The game is very short and contains a you to explore a graveyard map while picking up clues on what happened and also escaping from what is ahead of you.

Hope you like this game.

Here are some awesome assets I have used:-

https://skfb.ly/o7RyL - Fences

https://skfb.ly/6ULZs - house

https://skfb.ly/ooQzM - gravestones

https://skfb.ly/6XNUV - ghost

https://skfb.ly/6VO7s - ghost girl

https://skfb.ly/o87oU - character
